aboutPage.title: About Us - {{common.companyFullName}}
aboutPage.description: Learn more about {{common.companyFullName}}, our mission, and the passion behind our handcrafted wooden products.
aboutPage.keywords: woodcraft, handcrafted, wood products, wooden gifts, unique wood, artisan wood, {{COMPANY_SHORT_NAME}}, woodworking, about us, mission
aboutPage.heading: About {{common.companyFullName}}
aboutPage.text: {{common.companyFullName}} is dedicated to creating unique and high-quality wooden products. Each item is carefully handcrafted, reflecting our commitment to traditional artistry and sustainable practices. We believe in the beauty of natural wood and strive to bring warmth and elegance into your home.

catalogPage.title: Woodcraft Catalog - {{common.companyFullName}}

catalogPage.heading: Our Woodcraft Catalog
catalogPage.text: Explore our unique collection of handcrafted wooden items.

infoSection.card1Text: Every piece is a testament to the skill and dedication of our artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and unique design.
infoSection.card2Text: We are committed to using responsibly sourced, eco-friendly wood to protect our forests and the planet.
infoSection.card3Text: Your happiness is our priority. We work closely with you to create custom pieces that meet your exact vision and needs.
